APRs ARE NOT FIXED: the markets balance out supply and demand dynamically to reach the optimal equilibrium. APRs will vary based on market dynamics and user activities. An increase in the total supply of an asset will result in a decrease in the supply APR. On the flip side, anâ€¦

â€¢ Borrow APR = the interest you pay when you borrow an asset. In other words, it's the interest you pay on a loan. ie - If you borrow $100 worth of an asset at 10% borrow APR, after 1 year you will then owe $110.

In this episode, we dive deeper into APRs: â€¢ Supply APR = the interest you earn when you lend an asset. Your asset is added to the market as a borrowable asset. ie - If you supply $100 worth of an asset at 10% supply APR, it means you earn $110 after supplying for 1 year.

We have been working closely with Pyth on testing this feature and we have already successfully completed the first on-chain liquidatios through the Express Relay on

Key Features: - Liquidations are resolved in one-transaction within the same block - Oracle agnostic (use separate protocols to measure health factors and price the liquidation opportunities) - Immune to single transaction sandwich attacks that prevent liquidations.

PER - Pyth Express Relay solution allows DeFi protocols to each independently auction off the rights to liquidations via its own order flow auction (OFA), re-aligning incentives away from actors that impact and benefit from the (re)ordering of transactions.

We are thrilled to unveil to be one of the launch partners for the new groundbreaking feature of  - Express Relay It allows MEV recapture from potential liquidations and provides more efficient market dynamics.

We consider this new isolated pool one of our FLAGSHIP POOLS on Mode and thus we incentivize the liquidity with a 3x MODE points and 3x IONIC points for may yields - triple multipliers LFG!

By isolating Mode-native tokens, we effectively contain the risk to one pool only and allow lenders to assess the risk of the assets in that pool, to lend to the isolated pool of their choice (receiving juicy APY as borrow demand increases ofc!).

Why are isolated pools important? One of the largest risks to lending protocols is the risk of volatile collateral assets accruing bad debt. Having all liquidity in one pool exposed all assets to the risks of a few.

Our new isolated pool is focused on native Mode assets only, with a plan to further utilize this pool by adding additional Flagship Mode-native assets to properly support the Mode ecosystem with composable DeFi legos.

post: write from personal experience and be humble
